headline.main: FORTRESS DOWNED 11 FOES, SET MARK; U.S. Crew Established Record in Wilhelmshaven-Emden Raid on May 21

lead_paragraph: LONDON, May 31 (U.P.) -- The sharp-shooting crew of an American Flying Fortress set a new record during the United States raid on Wilhelmshaven and Emden on May 21, by destroying at least eleven German fighter planes, and probably several more, before their ship was damaged and forced down in the North Sea, it was announced officially today.
abstract: Pilots Flying Fortress which destroyed 11 Ger planes
